dao

Interface CouponDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouponDBDAO

    public interface CouponDAO
    the CompanyDAO interface should be implemented in any class that is used for connecting to the database and write or read data from the database,regarding the action for the coupons in the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Receives a coupon instance and register it in the database
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCoupon()
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons in the database
      Coupon getCoupon(long id)
      Retrieves a coupon instance from the database by it's id
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponByType(CouponType couponType)
      returns an ArrayList of all the coupons in the database of a given type
      void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Receives a coupon instance and removes it's entries from the database
      void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      Receives a coupon instance and update it's entries in the database

      • createCoupon

        void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws java.sql.SQLException,
                  java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                  DuplicateEntryException,
                  NullConnectionException
        Receives a coupon instance and register it in the database
        Parameters:
        coupon - a coupon instance
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - thrown when the sql query is wrong
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - thrown when the coupon class is not available
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown when the thread is interrupted - might be because the system is shutting down
        DuplicateEntryException - thrown when trying to register a coupon that already exist
        NullConnectionException - thrown when the connection is null
